alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 3:58PM MST until February 22 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts possible over the higher terrain of the Lower Yampa Basin. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin and Lower Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways with areas of blowing and heavy snowfall impacting visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
